Portable Tele:
A button that when pressed teleports you and your loot back to the ship. Must have Ship Teleporter unlocked!!!

Has a {0}% chance to self destruct on use.
Advanced Portable Tele:
A button that when pressed teleports you and your loot back to the ship. Must have Ship Teleporter unlocked!!!

Has a {0}% chance to self destruct on use.
Night Vision:
Grants night vision, pick up and left click to equip. This will grant night vision for {0} players and will {1} lost on death.

Battery drain speed: {2}/s
Battery regen speed: {3}/s

Type `info nv headset batteries` for info on upgrading headset.
Beekeeper: LVL {0} - ${1}: Circuit bees do {2}% of their base damage.
Bigger Lungs: LVL {0} - ${1}: Stamina Time is {2} units longer
Running Shoes: LVL {0} - ${1}: You can run {2} units faster
Light Footed:
LVL {0} - ${1}: Audible Noise Distance is reduced by {2} units. 
Applies to both sprinting and walking.
NV Headset Batteries: LVL {0} - ${1}: Drain speed is {2} // Regen speed is {3}
Discombobulator: LVL {0} - ${1}: Stun enemies around your ship in a {2} unit radius.
Back Muscles: LVL {0} - ${1}: Carry weight becomes {2}% of original.
Interns: Switch the monitor to target a dead player and enter `intern` into the terminal. This will cost {0} and will replace (revive) the dead player with an intern.
Locksmith: Run into locked doors to initiate a lockpicking minigame.
generalInfo:
Late Game Upgrades

Type `lategame store` or `lgu` to view upgrades.
Most of the mod is configurable via the config file `Bepinex/config/com.malco.lethalcompany.moreshipupgrades`
UPGRADES ARE APPLIED ONLY TO THE CLIENT THAT PURCHASED THEM BY DEFAULT.
Use the info command to get info about an item/upgrade.
You must type the exact name of the upgrade when purchasing. Ex: `beekeeper` not `buy beekeeper`.
To reset your upgrades type `reset lgu`.
To copy another clients upgrades type `load lgu steam_name`.
In the case of credit desync or upgrade loss, type `forceCredits 123`. To send the rpc to sync credits type `syncCredits`.
Type `unload upgrade_name` to remove that upgrades effects.

Have fun - malco
